name: Buffalo Chicken Rolls
author: LKNLakeLife.com
summary: Delicious chicken breasts marinated in hot sauce and filled with shredded Provolone cheese. Serve with Ranch or blue cheese dressing! Blue cheese lovers may substitute blue cheese for the Provolone.
ingredients: 4  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/4 inch thickness
directions: In a small bowl, stir together the melted butter and hot sauce
Place chicken breasts in a glass bowl, and pour the sauce over
Turn to coat, cover and refrigerate for 15 to 20 minutes
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Remove chicken breasts from the hot sauce, and place 1 tablespoon of cheese in the center of each one
Roll up, and secure with a toothpick
Repeat with remaining breasts, and place them seam side down in a glass baking dish
Cover the dish, and bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is fork tender
Increase the temperature of the oven to 450 degrees, and place the chicken 8 inches from the heat
Uncover, and bake for 5 minutes, until browned
Garnish with remaining shredded cheese, remove toothpicks, and serve with ranch or blue cheese dressing
